name: King of the Monsters
overview: ONLY THE MONSTERS WILL SURVIVE. The Universe has turned, and Man is no longer master of the Earth. The Era of the Super Monster has arrived. Each monsters is cruel and vicious, but who is the strongest Super Monster of all? Only through battle will this be known, as Cities are smashed and Mankind quakes with fear. Become one of four Super Monsters, and challenge the rest to combat. Fight with massive force and use special powers to defeat Monster and human foes alike. Avoid the human's military might and smash their tanks and planes or use them as bludgeons against your fellow Monsters. Defeat all opponents to be crowned the greatest Super Monster of all!
